name: Mask Clicker (Coronavirus Relief Game) 全民造口罩
name_original: Mask Clicker (Coronavirus Relief Game) 全民造口罩
description:
This is a not-for-profit project for the game jam event “Gaming Spirit Bomb”.

It's about 10 days making a game in solidarity for cheering people up under current Coronavirus outbreak situation. ୧(๑•̀⌄•́๑)૭✧

Be Strong, China!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

More masks are required! URGENT!

Let's make masks together and send to necessary crowds!

This is a mini click & idle game of making masks for the multiverse!

Hope you enjoy it!

- Leaderboard available! (ง •̀_•́)ง

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

这是一款参加公益游戏开发活动https://www.ciga.me/bomb “游戏元气弹”的小作品，由我们两个人在10天里开发~

口罩稀缺，前线急需！
让我们一起来制作口罩，送给需要的朋友们吧！！

点击屏幕，当口罩数量超过需求订单数就通关啦~

做了个口罩点击放置类游戏，表达一下大家最近求口罩而不得的心情XD

希望能给大家打打气！中国加油！

自带排行榜和中英双语支持，欢迎大家刷榜玩玩看！

开发小队 / Credits~
